validateAndStore() - Method in class sik.client.admin.RecordsGUIListener
Method to validate the values in the text fields of the Records GUI upon a 'save edit' or 'save new' record execution before performing the actual save to file operation.

Validates the pin number field, in conjunction with the containsOnlyNumbers method
